original_text: I will not venture to speak of anything except what Christ has accomplished through me in leading the Gentiles to obey God by what I have said and done—
korean_text: 그리스도께서 이방인들을 순종하게 하기 위하여 나를 통하여 역사하신 것 외에는 내가 감히 말하지 아니하노라 그 일은 말과 행위로

sentences.original_text: I will not venture to speak of anything
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 어떤 것에 대해서도 감히 말하지 않겠습니다

sentences.original_text: except what Christ has accomplished through me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도께서 나를 통해 이루신 일을 제외하고는

sentences.original_text: in leading the Gentiles to obey God
by what I have said and done
